lead_paragraph: A delegation from the Houthi rebel movement is conducting peace talks directly with Saudi Arabia for the first time since Yemen’s civil war began nearly a year ago.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Yemen: Houthi Rebels Enter Peace Talks With Saudi Arabia
headline.main: Yemen: Houthi Rebels Enter Peace Talks With Saudi Arabia

snippet: A delegation from the Houthi rebel movement is conducting peace talks directly with Saudi Arabia for the first time since Yemen’s civil war began nearly a year ago.
abstract: Houthi rebels travel to Saudi Arabia to conduct direct peace talks for first time in Yemen's year-long civil war; hope is for prisoner exchanges, reduction in fighting along Saudi-Yemeni border and broader agreement to end conflict altogether.
